heading: Become a volunteer
paragraph1: Do you want to fix bikes and make Trondheim a more sustainable city? Trondheim Bike Kitchen is run by 10–15 volunteers, and we are always looking for more. Volunteering here does not require prior skills—we always have experienced people present, and we learn from each other.
li1: Help us keep the place open for our Repair Wednesdays
li2: Help others with their bicycle repairs
li5: Get to know a bunch of friendly cyclists
paragraph3: Interested? Swing by any Wednesday, or reach out to kontakt@sykkelkjokken.no.
